pkgmetadata.longdescription: Additional Functions for 'GeoPAT' 2 // Supports analysis of spatial data processed with the 'GeoPAT' 2 software https://github.com/Nowosad/geopat2. Available features include creation of a grid based on the 'GeoPAT' 2 grid header file and reading a 'GeoPAT' 2 text outputs.
